title: 5-Minute Deep Breathing
description: Practice box breathing to reduce stress and improve focus during study sessions.

title: Desk Stretches
description: Simple stretches to relieve neck, shoulder, and back tension from studying.

title: Pomodoro Reminder
description: Take a 5-minute break every 25 minutes to maintain peak concentration.

title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
description: Systematically tense and relax muscle groups to reduce physical stress.

title: Hydration Check
description: Drink a glass of water to maintain hydration and cognitive function.

title: Active Recall Practice
description: Quiz yourself on recently studied material without looking at notes.

title: Eye Rest Exercise
description: Follow the 20-20-20 rule: look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds.

title: Gratitude Moment
description: Reflect on three things you're grateful for to boost positive mindset.

title: Environment Check
description: Optimize lighting, temperature, and eliminate distractions in your study space.

title: Quick Walk
description: Take a brief walk outside to boost circulation and clear your mind.
